channel.title: Rust on Tadej's bits and bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Tadej's bits and bytes

item.title: AOC 2024 Day 9: A clever use of heaps
item.description:
I’m participating in this year’s Advent of Code writing solutions in all 3 languages I am proficient in: Python, Go and C++.

I came across an interesting solution to the Day 9 problem. This is still one of the earlier days, so you’re not supposed to pull out the big guns (fancy algos) just yet. Nevertheless, this solution (which I’ll get to in just a minute) made an interesting use of min heaps to acheive a substantial speedup on part 2 of the problem.
